description:
Position Details:

Industry Retail
Job Title Data Analyst - Junior
Duration 06 months (Possible Extension / Conversion)
Location Fully Remote
Pay Range $38.00/hr - $45.00/hr

Job Description:
• Takes direction/tasks from manager/team leads
• Interact with vendors
• Manage excel trackers
• Work in vendor portals
• Work closely with project implementation teams
• Partner with our TEM (Telecom Expense Management) Vendor
• Research in both internal and external systems
• Asset management
• Reporting
• Data Analysis

Skills and behaviors needed for the role:
• 1-5 years telecom expense management experience
• Basic knowledge about different modes of telecommunication and how they generate expense to the company
• Accomplished time management skills, prioritizing large workloads, holding self and others accountable for their deliverables
• Excellent communication, observation, and analytical skills
• Accelerated Excel competency required to analyze, reconcile, and manipulate large amounts of data
• Knowledge of accounting and financial management
• Understanding of invoice, allocation, and organizational hierarchy in relation to accounting practices

Company DescriptionCollabera is a Global Digital Solutions Company providing Software Engineering Solutions for the world's most tech-forward organizations in the areas of Engineering, Cloud and Data/AI. With its roots serving the engineering needs of the world's most recognized businesses in Technology, Financial Services, Telecom and Healthcare, Collabera today operates across 60 locations in 11 countries, serves 30% of the Fortune 500, and has exceeded the industry growth rate by 3-4x for several years.
